Method Detail

ruin

java.util.Collection<Job> ruin(java.util.Collection<VehicleRoute> vehicleRoutes)
Ruins a current solution, i.e. a collection of vehicle-routes and returns a collection of removed and thus unassigned jobs.

Parameters:
{@link - VehicleRoute}
Returns:
Collection of Job
